title: British pound drops after N. Ireland's DUP says cannot back Brexit deal
text:
British pound drops after N. Ireland's DUP says cannot back Brexit deal

Forex 20 minutes ago (Oct 17, 2019 08:06)

© Reuters. British pound drops after N. Ireland's DUP says cannot back Brexit deal LONDON, Oct 17 (Reuters) - The British pound skidded on Thursday after Northern Ireland's Democratic Unionist Party said it could not support the Brexit deal as it currently stands. slid as much as 0.6% to $1.2748 GBP=D3 , and also declined 0.5% versus the euro to as low as 86.81 pence EURGBP=D3 , before steadying and recouping some of those losses.

British pound drops after N. Ireland's DUP says cannot back Brexit deal
description: British pound drops after N. Ireland's DUP says cannot back Brexit deal
